reviewText: A bit crass but decent info was provided.

This is what the name says The Ultimate , I have many guides and The Hoods get the basics and practical info to you. Ever wonder how an astronaut does his or her duty? Ron  talks about dumping in the woods, many useful tips even for me so has been out in the woods and such for decades and Karen gives the ladies tips which I have passed to my daughters. This  Hoods Woods like earlier DVDs has the info for the survivalist not just entertainment like some of the others. Of course you must get the whole set before this one. I had not visited the web home page before and I did not know that Ron had passed until "The in memory of Ron" on this dvd , great loss but Karen is continuing. Check out the Hoods Woods home page for more. Essential for anyone thinking about surviving.

The man was a genius when it came to the outdoors. This video has something for everyone and is easily shown so you will remember when needed most. In an emergency. Awesome video to be watched over and over again...
VERY SORRY TO HEAR HE PASSED AWAY
